summary: Ravenwood Manor is north of Swindlers Den and is adoption, spouse and companion friendly.  It supports the adoption of up to six children.  It also has a general store and merchant and the property is protected by a guard.  There is also a stables for your horse and an outhouse.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red] Ravenwood Manor [/color]

Ravenwood Manor is north of Swindlers Den and is adoption, spouse and companion friendly.  It supports the adoption of up to six children with the use of Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions.  Although that mod is not required it is recommended.  Ravenwood Manor also has a general goods store and merchant as well as a guard.   There is also an outhouse and stables for your horse.    


[color=red] FEATURES: [/color]

- Adoption friendly. (Supports up to 6 children)
- Spouse and companion friendly.
- General goods merchant and store.
- Outhouse and stables.
- All crafting stations.
- Plenty of safe storage.
- Property protected by guard.


[color=red] Requirements: [/color]


Hearthfire
Skyrim Patch 1.9.32.0.8


[color=red] Recommended: [/color]

Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix
 

[color=red] Install: [/color]

Just copy RavenWoodManor.esp into your SkyrimData folder.


[color=red] Uninstall: [/color]

Just delete RavenWoodManor.esp from your SkyrimData folder.
author: SuperMegaSuperMega
